Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/twitter/plumage.js

rename Model.getLabel to Model.getDisplayName

ignore idea files

compile
added class to differentiate filter field

more organized way to get select list values
call onLoad after page load in bufferedCollection so it gets fetched = true

have grid trigger itemSelected even if not cell selectable

default total to 0 in buffered collection instead of undefined

started on validation
